website_summaries.verdict: Moderately-priced manual sharpener that helps you restore your blade in four steps.
pros: Four stages of sharpening with angles for Asian and European blades
Straightforward design with directions that are easy to understand
Works for both righties and lefties
cons: Some were disappointed with the level of sharpness this tool provided
May not get knives as sharp as a whetstone, but it's a whole lot easier to use

customer_reviews.title: Easy yet effective.
customer_reviews.text: Sharpening knives is not a chore I enjoy. But I like a sharp knife in the kitchen, nothing worse than trying to cut veggies or meat and the knife requires too much elbow grease to cut. I have always been skeptical of these types of sharpeners, preferring a sharpening rod or stone system, but after going through my kitchen knives in under 10 minutes, I am sold. I would recommend this to anyone who cares about sharp knives, but hates the time it takes to use a rod or stone.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get this thing to sharpen any decently made knife. I have tried to sharpen my Cutco chefs knife, and my dalstrong chefs knife and this sharpener doesn't do anything for them. I ended up buying a whetstone.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Winger

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: Mine was delivered within the last month and I've only used it once or twice. First time I was able to sharpen 4 of my Henckels kitchen cutlery (a couple pretty dull ones in the mix) in about 5 minutes. About 5 pulls through the coarse wheel followed by 3-4 on the fine wheel. Second time was a Gerber folding knife. Nice edges on all and they seem to be holding well. Being new I can't say much about durability yet but my old (Henckels sharpener lasted over 30 years. So I'm optimistic in that regard...
customer_reviews.author: Huck

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Have a set of Henckel knives but have never sharpened them. This tool did the trick! I’m not looking for perfection like some others that write bad reviews thinking an at home tool designed for the novice will provide the same results as taking knives to a professional to have them sharpened. That is unrealistic and unfair to the manufacturers of this product who clearly worked hard to make a sharpener that does a good job at sharpening knives and is safe for the home consumers. This is a great tool that sharpened my Henckels and didn’t cut my fingers off in the process!
customer_reviews.author: Mom in LA

customer_reviews.title: Much Better Than $25 Henckels Sharpener From Dept. Store
customer_reviews.text: When we bought our knife set from Macy's, we also purchased a Henckels single-stage sharpener. Did ok. I bought this one because I have a couple of Japanese knives that I wanted to sharpen. It performs MUCH better than the sharpener we had purchased with the set for the Standard blades and sharpened my Japanese knives well, also. So glad I went with this! It also sticks to the countertop a lot better and is more sturdy than the single-stage sharpener we had.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: does a good job of sharpening both Asian and Western-style cutting edges
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hone my kitchen knives each time I use them to keep them sharp. This is easy to use and although it doesn't provide the sharpness that informed use of sharpening stone would provide, one doesn't have to have such skills to use this. I like it and it is easy to hold still.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for the price. Easy to use. The bottom is rubberized so it doesn't wiggle around while sharpening.
customer_reviews.author: KayCoop

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Henckel sharpener.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Very impressed. Easy to use. Knives end up being very sharp very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Alice

customer_reviews.title: Good multi angle sharpener
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sharpener for a new set of Henkel 4 star knives that replaced a set we had for 40 years. I have not used much yet but it seems well made and appears to sharpen effectively. I like that fact that it can sharpen two different angles, one for Asian and one for European knives. It’s actually heavier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: So glad we bought this knife shrlener for our henckle knives. My husband accidentally broke some of knives by sharpening it with the rod sharpener so we got this one and oh my goodness is it a lot easier to use than what we had. Not quite sure how to use the different settings right now but we only just need one to sharpen them all!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Only for said name brand knives*
customer_reviews.text: I was told these are only for use with the said brand of knives, as the angles are set specifically for them. Didn't want to risk ruining any of my good knives, so I returned it. Overall it is a nice sharpener, if you have this brand of knives I'd definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not great results
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work as well as wel hoped. We will continue trying, but our knives don’t feel much sharper.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: It does a good job without wasting too much time
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use and is good enough to sharpen my knives. The main reason I bought this one is because I have both standard and Asian style knives to sharpen. I also like that it is easy and quick to use. I do not expect this sharpener to do a professional job, but I don’t care to so much time to sharpen my knives either.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Tsubota

customer_reviews.title: Its good if your knives are not in good shape
customer_reviews.text: It can bring a dead knife back to good life, but I'd still rather have my knives professionally sharpened. And I wouldn't touch a professionally sharpened knife with this for at least a year.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Findlay

customer_reviews.title: If your kitchen is home to both European and Asian knives, this tool is essential.
customer_reviews.text: Needed this as I recently bought a set of Asian knives which need the 10 degree sharpening stones. It is well made, and affords both sharpening options.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Croll

customer_reviews.title: Zwilling is the best. ———Comes from a zwilling supper fun
customer_reviews.text: Sharping the knife are always bothering me. Until I got this. Help yourself don’t buy those cheaper Chinese product even how cheap it is. Believe me. Not working !!! Zwilling is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Song

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. I tried sharpening my not so dull Heckels Chef knife and it actually dulled it up more. Tried a few passes on light pressure, after failiing I applied a bit more pressure on each pass but nothing. Will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Heriberto Arreola

customer_reviews.title: Stay sharp when it matters
customer_reviews.text: When Costco carry's this same model, it's sells for $19.95. Nonetheless, the unit works very well at leaving your blades with a surgeon sharp edge.
customer_reviews.author: FABFOUR5150

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and sharpens knives great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband to sharpen our knives. He said it works great and is easy to use
customer_reviews.author: D Voltz

customer_reviews.title: Sharpens!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my Henckels Twins! Works well and sharpens them like new!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda M Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Product that works
customer_reviews.text: It is small, easy to use, and sharpens my knives perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: B. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Sharpness degrades after a few months
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this sharpener for the good reputation of ZWilling. However its sharpness degraded after a few months. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: If you are not a professional chef it does the trick
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen L. Basso

customer_reviews.title: Works great on knives. Very durable well worth the money to keep your knife set sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Works great on knives. Very durable well worth the money to keep your knife set sharp.
customer_reviews.author: David Kahn

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift for my husband - he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised! My 40 year old set of Henckels’ 4 Star kitchen knives are as sharp as new.
customer_reviews.author: william l.

customer_reviews.title: Safe to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy and safe to use. Works wonders on older, tired knives.
customer_reviews.author: PoppyG

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. It brought old knives back to life!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't get it to work on my good knives
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get this thing to work on my Wusthof Ikon knives. It may be because a professional sharpening service sharpened them to a different angle, and this thing didn't have enough effectiveness to fix the angle. It didn't seem like this was hard enough/abrasive enough, or maybe the Ikons are harder steel than this is meant for. I got it for my santokus, which are supposed to be 10 degrees per side. I've had a lot better luck with the Chef's Choice Trizor XV electric sharpener, so I just used that to sharpen my santokus to 15 degrees, and they are plenty sharp, so I don't think I'm going to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Available in US only.
customer_reviews.text: Pros. 1. Works fine. 2. Comes with Lifetime warranty. Cons. 1. It is made in China (not Germany Made) 2. You can't wash this with water. (No submerge or rinse with water)
customer_reviews.author: everich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My old knives are now as sharp as the new ones. This thing works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: gk

customer_reviews.title: Don't use on Damascus Kitchen Knives or it will leave scratches
customer_reviews.text: I bought his since I own a set of JA Henckels Zwilling Kramer stainless Damascus knives. I figured it would work being from the same company. I was wrong and used them on one of the small knives to test it. They didn't sharpen as much as I liked but the worst part was it left scratches higher up on the blade than on the edge.
customer_reviews.author: MikeTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: That it's easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use but you have to sharpen the knives often. If a knife is dull, you have to bring the edge back with a stone first. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Massimini

customer_reviews.title: Left my edge sub-par.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I didn't run my Zwillings J.A. Henckel Pro Knife set through this. Left my good knife set with a sub-par edge. I'll run my lower end knives through this all day long, but I'll probably look for higher end sharpening stones for my good set.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. l

customer_reviews.title: Help for your knives
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. I sharpened 28 knives in no time and they are working very well.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Stang

customer_reviews.title: It works really well
customer_reviews.text: You still need to hit the rod when they get really dull but after you do that you use the stones and about 4 swipes on each one and it is just like new. Cuts like butta.
customer_reviews.author: Musicman44mag

customer_reviews.title: Good sharpener, cheap construction
customer_reviews.text: Sharpens easily and does a good job, but the unit is made of a cheap plastic and it is easy to damage it while sharpening your knives.
customer_reviews.author: M. D.

customer_reviews.title: Good sharpener
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift purchase, but I have owned one for several years and I have found it to be a really decent knife sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: Casey's Dad

customer_reviews.title: A bit klunky, but easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This uses up more space than I would like, but it does the job and is stable and easy and safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL DEBARY

customer_reviews.title: My knives are sharp again
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Perfect tool to keep your knives sharp without a learning curve on how to sharp knives.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Keep it beside by knife block Excellent for keeping my Zwilling knifes sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy legs

customer_reviews.title: Super Sharpener
customer_reviews.text: Best sharpener I’ve ever owned. I have had a bunch of them over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Durable design and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Finally able to bring my investment back to spec! I bought a set of double zwillig and now am able to cut, slice and dice as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Polyboy03g

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality, durable and easy to use! Works on standard and Japanese style blades! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Warren

product_meta.title: ZWILLING J.A. Henckels 4-Stage Pull Through Knife Sharpener
product_meta.description: Safely and easily keep your knives razor sharp with the 4-stage pull through knife sharpener. Ceramic rods in both coarse and fine grits will put an edge on even the dullest knife with only a few strokes. One side features a 15 Degree angle for Western-style knives, the other a 10 Degree angle for Asian-style knives. The protected safety grip keeps your fingers out of harms way while allowing the sharpener to stay firmly on a surface.
feature_bullets: Quickly and safely sharpens your blades
Four stages, coarse and fine for both western and Asian-style blades
Easy to use, just pull through

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars319 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
